txt.en: Talk to Hermáth Stormhammer at Zidir-nesad
Talk to Hermáth Stormhammer and witness 'Memories of Máttugard'

Hermáth Stormhammer can be found at Zidir-nesad, the Steepset.\n\nHermáth Stormhammer has offered to tell you his tale of the siege of Máttugard during the Sixth War of the Dwarves and Orcs. You should talk to Hermáth Stormhammer.
Hermáth Stormhammer can be found at Zidir-nesad, the Steepset.\n\nYou have listened to Hermáth Stormhammer's tale of the siege of Máttugard. You should talk to Hermáth Stormhammer.

Although over two hundred years have passed since the Haban'akkâ of Thráin set siege to Máttugard during the Sixth War of the Dwarves and Orcs, memories of that fateful battle have never left the mind of Hermáth Stormhammer.
